synopsis.text: Jun's life takes a dramatic turn when he receives a mysterious mask from a clown residing in his bedroom mirror. As a new student at Doumori Elementary School, Jun struggles to fit in, often falling victim to bullying. His only solace comes from his love for clowns and his imaginary friend, Pierre, the mirror clown. When Pierre gifts Jun the magical mask, the once timid boy gains extraordinary powers, enabling him to stand up against his tormentors and gain popularity among his peers. However, this newfound strength comes with a dark side, as strange accidents begin to plague the school. As Jun's behavior becomes increasingly bizarre, it's up to his teacher, Nube, to uncover the true intentions of the enigmatic clown in the mirror. Prepare for a thrilling ride as Jun navigates the complexities of friendship, courage, and the supernatural in this captivating anime.
